failure.message: failed Testing the capture of STDOUT

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Testing the capture of STDOUT
When I run the rake task 'cucumber_rake_runner:stdout_test' Then the contents of STDOUT should contain 'String expected to be sent to STDOUT'
